0.text: Innate: Periodically, Galio's next basic attack has an  uncancellable windup and is modified to deal 15 − 200 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) (+ 50% AP) (+ 60% bonus magic resistance) magic damage to the target and all enemies near them.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Galio's next basic attack has an uncancellable windup and is modified to deal 15 − 200 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) (+ 50% AP) (+ 60% bonus magic resistance) magic damage to the target and all enemies near them.

1.text: Colossal Smash can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus magic damage to all targets hit.
1.html: Colossal Smash can critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus magic damage to all targets hit.

0.text: Active: Galio creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target area, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.
0.html: Active: Galio creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target area, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.

1.text: When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds and slowly moves forward, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 150 against  monsters.
1.html: When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds and slowly moves forward, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 150 against monsters.

0.content: 2.5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

1.content: 10% (+ 4% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

2.text: Winds of War will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Winds of War will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Passive: Galio gains Anti-Magic Bulwark, and restores it after 12 seconds without taking damage.Anti-Magic Bulwark: Gain a  shield that absorbs magic damage.
0.html:
Passive: Galio gains Anti-Magic Bulwark, and restores it after 12 seconds without taking damage.

Anti-Magic Bulwark: Gain a shield that absorbs magic damage.

1.text: Active: Galio  charges for up to 3 seconds,  slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage  reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and  taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.
1.html: Active: Galio charges for up to 3 seconds, slowing himself by 15%, and gaining magic damage reduction and half of that amount as physical damage reduction; charging increases Shield of Durand's radius, damage and taunt duration over the first 2 seconds of the channel.

0.content: 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% (+ 5% per 100 AP) (+ 8% per 100 bonus magic resistance)

1.content: 10 / 12.5 / 15 / 17.5 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) (+ 4% per 100 bonus magic resistance)

2.text: Shield of Durand can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when  interrupted.
2.html: Shield of Durand can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when interrupted.

3.text: Recast: Galio refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds and  taunts nearby enemy champions, setting their  movement speed to a static 60 for 0.5 − 1.5 (based on channel time) seconds. This also deals magic damage, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time).
3.html: Recast: Galio refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds and taunts nearby enemy champions, setting their  movement speed to a static 60 for 0.5 − 1.5 (based on channel time) seconds. This also deals magic damage, increased by 0% − 200% (based on channel time).

0.text: Active: During the cast time, Galio  steps backwards in the opposite direction. He then  dashes to the target location until he hits an enemy  champion or terrain.
0.html: Active: During the cast time, Galio steps backwards in the opposite direction. He then dashes to the target location until he hits an enemy champion or terrain.

1.text: Galio deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds as well as  reveals them for the same duration.
1.html: Galio deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and knocks them up for 0.75 seconds as well as reveals them for the same duration.

2.text: Justice Punch will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Justice Punch will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Galio designates the target allied  champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot, resetting  Shield of Durand's passive magic  shield for himself and additionally granting it to all allied champions in the area he casted it at for 5 seconds, and  channels for 2.75 seconds.
0.html: Active: Galio designates the target allied champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot, resetting Shield of Durand's passive magic shield for himself and additionally granting it to all allied champions in the area he casted it at for 5 seconds, and channels for 2.75 seconds.

1.text: After channeling for 1.25 seconds, Galio gains  crowd control immunity for the remaining duration and becomes  untargetable, then leaps into the air for 0.85 seconds before  dashing to the location over 0.25 seconds, after which he lands and becomes targetable again, standing in place for 0.4 seconds and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact as well as  knocking them back 100 units over 0.75 seconds.
1.html: After channeling for 1.25 seconds, Galio gains crowd control immunity for the remaining duration and becomes untargetable, then leaps into the air for 0.85 seconds before dashing to the location over 0.25 seconds, after which he lands and becomes targetable again, standing in place for 0.4 seconds and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact as well as knocking them back 100 units over 0.75 seconds.

active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. 0.concerningText: Passive: Galio gains Anti-Magic Bulwark, and restores it after 12 seconds without taking damage.Anti-Magic Bulwark: Gain a  shield that absorbs magic damage.

origin: 10% (+ 4% per 100 ap) of target's maximum health
st_flatStats0.concerningText: When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds and slowly moves forward, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within the area. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 150 against  monsters.
